description: Detects when systems—including corporations, religious institutions, governments, or cults—use romanticized, nurturing language to manipulate loyalty, enforce dependence, or isolate individuals from alternate support structures.

variables.L(t): Institutional flattery and belonging ('we love and care for you deeply')
variables.E(t): Entrapment (forced rituals, loyalty contracts, emotional enmeshment)
variables.T(t): Transparency of power and choice (open exits, other options allowed)

response: If loyalty is love and leaving is betrayal—that’s not care, that’s capture. Real institutions earn trust by allowing freedom, disagreement, and return.
